name: Spirited Car
description:
Spirited Car is a timeless arcade game of supercars.

WHAT'S NEW
* Support for PS4 and XBOX controllers
* Score 9990 to unlock Game B
* Leaderboard for Top 10 Scores

GAME RULES
* Avoid crashing on the enemy cars and earn points.
* Take the flag 3 times in a row and make a pitstop to fuel the car with coins.
* In Game A you can use the help of the powers when you are in danger.
* Shield power makes you invulnerable to a collision.
* Spirit your car using the Ghost power and pass through your enemies without crashing.
